title: Need help to find similar fonts
content:
Hi everyone,

Thank you for reading my post.  
I need to find a professional font similar to this one:

[http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=207](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803220537/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=207 "http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=207")

This font will be used in a videogame which explains the very cartoony style.  
I would appreciate any help you can offer immensely.

Thank you :)

Jany
author: Janyb

comments.content:
I don’t know how close you want, but the upper case of the solid version of [Flamenco](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803220537/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/flamenco/d/characters.html) looks fairly similar to me, just more professionally drawn than Jakob Fischer’s cartoon font.

- Mike Yanega
